summary: Interactive romantic-themed Valentine proposal web page (HTML/CSS/JS) for iPad Chrome, with Yes/No choices where No evades hover and Yes reveals a meme-style "Good choice❤️" image/message.
architectural_notes: Use plain static HTML/CSS/JS with all assets locally referenced or embedded so it can run easily in iPad Chrome.
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Meme-style image with bold caption text “Good choice❤️”, romantic pink/white aesthetic (valentine-good-choice-meme.dim_1024x1024.png)

existing_features.title: Create a single-page romantic Valentine prompt UI that asks the user: “Will you be my Valentine?” with two prominent options: “Yes” and “No”.

Implement the “No” option as an evasive button: when the user attempts to interact with it (mouse hover/pointer enter on desktop; touch attempt on iPad), it moves to a new on-screen position so it cannot be clicked.
When the user clicks “Yes”, replace the prompt with a celebratory reveal that displays a meme-style image containing the text “Good choice❤️”.
Apply a romantic-themed visual design using a pink and white color scheme, with responsive layout that works well on iPad Chrome in both portrait and landscape.
Add the required generated meme image as a static frontend asset and render it directly from the frontend (do not fetch it from the backend).

new_feature_requests.summary: Build a simple romantic-themed interactive Valentine proposal web page (HTML/CSS/JS) runnable on iPad Chrome.
